<a id="SubtweenTweener"></a>

# SubtweenTweener

**Inherits:** [Tweener](Tweener.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Runs a [Tween](Tween.md) nested within another [Tween](Tween.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**SubtweenTweener** is used to execute a [Tween](Tween.md) as one step in a sequence defined by another [Tween](Tween.md). See [Tween.tween_subtween()](Tween.md#Tween_method_tween_subtween) for more usage information.

\ **Note:** [Tween.tween_subtween()](Tween.md#Tween_method_tween_subtween) is the only correct way to create **SubtweenTweener**. Any **SubtweenTweener** created manually will not function correctly.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="SubtweenTweener_method_set_delay"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[SubtweenTweener](SubtweenTweener.md) **set_delay**\ (\ delay\: [float](float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#SubtweenTweener_method_set_delay)

Sets the time in seconds after which the **SubtweenTweener** will start running the subtween. By default there's no delay.
